thread.title: Andy Lau expected to be discharged in early March, AsiaOne Showbiz News
thread.title_full: Andy Lau expected to be discharged in early March, AsiaOne Showbiz News

title: Andy Lau expected to be discharged in early March, AsiaOne Showbiz News
text:
The Star/ANN | Monday, Feb 20, 2017 Actor Andy Lau has been advised to rest for up to 11 months after fracturing his pelvis in multiple places in a filming accident earlier this month. Photo: Reuters The Star/ANN Monday, Feb 20, 2017 
ACTOR and singer Andy Lau, who is recuperating at a hospital in Hong Kong, is expected to be discharged early next month, Guang Ming Daily reported. 
The report stated that the 55-year-old, who was injured after he fell off a horse while filming a commercial near Bangkok on Jan 17, will be restricted to a wheelchair after his discharge. 
Lau's residence is being renovated to accommodate his movements at home. 
He has said that he could sit up on his hospital bed but was not allowed to walk. 373904
